name: PRINXE-MD
description: PRINXE-MD A SUPER WHATSAPP USER BOT

HKEY.description: Put your Heroku API key Here

HAPP.description: Put the Heroku app name, same as above entered

PREFIX.description: Put any one symbol here except @ and + , leave it Blank if you want to use multiple prefix

antidelete.description: BOT will forward deleted messages if you make it true

ANTI_LINK.description: Make true false to ON/OFF antilink

AUTOREAD.description: Make true to auto check users messages

VIEWONCE.description: Make true if wanna get view once message

STATUSVIEW.description: Make it true if you want the bot to auto view status

Status_Saver.description: Make it true if you want the bot to auto save your contacts status

ANTI_CALL.description: Make it true if you want bot to Block unknown callers

AutoReaction.description: Make it true if you want bot to react on chats

SESSION_ID.description: put your session ID here in the box below
